expected_output:
West of House
This is an open field west of a white house, with a boarded front door.
A rubber mat saying 'Welcome to Zork!' lies by the door.
Opening the small mailbox reveals a leaflet.

(Taken)
"WELCOME TO ZORK!
ZORK is a game of adventure, danger, and low cunning. In it you will explore some of the most amazing territory ever seen by mortals. No computer should be without one!"
Dropped.

Behind House
You are behind the white house. A path leads into the forest to the east. In one corner of the house there is a small window which is slightly ajar.
With a great effort, you open the window far enough to allow entry.

Kitchen
You are in the kitchen of the white house. A table seems to have been used recently for the preparation of food. A passage leads to the west and a dark staircase can be seen leading upward. A dark chimney leads down and to the east is a small window which is open.
A bottle of water is on the table.
A brown sack, smelling of hot peppers, is on the table.

Kitchen
You are in the kitchen of the white house. A table seems to have been used recently for the preparation of food. A passage leads to the west and a dark staircase can be seen leading upward. A dark chimney leads down and to the east is a small window which is open.
A bottle of water is on the table.
A brown sack, smelling of hot peppers, is on the table.

Living Room
You are in the living room. There is a doorway to the east. To the west is a wooden door with strange gothic lettering, which is closed. A dark staircase leads up and down. There is a trophy case here.
A battery-powered brass lantern is on the trophy case.
A large oriental rug is on the floor.
Above the trophy case hangs an elvish sword of great antiquity.

With a great effort, the rug is moved to one side of the room.
With the rug moved, the dusty cover of a closed trap door appears.
The trap door is now open.

Cellar
You are in a dark and damp cellar with a narrow passage leading north. To the west is a circular room with a railing.
It is pitch black. You are likely to be eaten by a grue.
It is pitch black. You are likely to be eaten by a grue.

The Troll Room
This is a small room with passages to the east and south and a forbidding hole leading west. Bloodstains and deep scratches (perhaps made by an axe) mark the walls.
A nasty-looking troll, brandishing a bloody axe, blocks all passages out of the room.

You are in a dark and damp cellar with a narrow passage leading north. To the west is a circular room with a railing.
The trap door is open.

The Troll Room
This is a small room with passages to the east and south and a forbidding hole leading west. Bloodstains and deep scratches (perhaps made by an axe) mark the walls.
The troll, who is remarkably ugly, is here blocking the way.

The troll is a fearsome creature, with dry, leathery skin and a foul odor. It is brandishing a bloody axe.
The troll is evidently a thief, as he is carrying a large bag of treasures.

A furious but glancing blow is struck.
The troll's axe barely misses your ear.

The troll is disarmed by a subtle feint.
The troll's axe drops to the floor and vanishes.
The troll is staggered, and drops his bag. He is still moving, but very slowly.

The troll is knocked out!
The troll is lying on the ground, unconscious.
The troll is lying on the ground, unconscious.

[Chasm]
A chasm extends to the east and west. A narrow ledge of rock runs along the southern wall of the chasm. You can hear the sound of rapidly flowing water from below.

[The Troll Room]
This is a small room with passages to the east and south and a forbidding hole leading west. Bloodstains and deep scratches (perhaps made by an axe) mark the walls.
The troll is lying on the ground, unconscious.

[Cellar]
You are in a dark and damp cellar with a narrow passage leading north. To the west is a circular room with a railing.
The trap door is open.

[Living Room]
You are in the living room. There is a doorway to the east. To the west is a wooden door with strange gothic lettering, which is closed. A dark staircase leads up and down. There is a trophy case here.
The trap door is open.
A battery-powered brass lantern is on the trophy case.
A large oriental rug is on the floor.
Above the trophy case hangs an elvish sword of great antiquity.
The trap door is open.
The rug is at one side of the room.
The troll's bag is on the floor.
The bloody axe is on the floor.

Your score is 5 of a possible 350, in 25 moves.
This gives you the rank of Beginner.
Do you wish to leave the game? (Y is affirmative)
Ok.
